segments.text: I am observing an indoor kitchen scene right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman standing in front of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is completely fixed on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink, oh my, it's overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the front edge in a continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a widening puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already right in that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed any of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains perfectly neutral, she's utterly unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is definitely running, and the drain isn't working.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a sight to behold, this domestic oblivious chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
